FORMAT: Sukkar
REMARKS:
Across six audition episodes, we will have three Golden Mics. A Golden Mic means a direct entry into the Top 16. 
Each judge will have 1 Golden Mic each. 
In addition to the Golden Mics, approximately 30 more participants will be shortlisted for the Piano Round.
(15 boys + 15 girls)

FORMAT: One audition for participants from across Pakistan will be held in Karachi
REMARKS: Can run a promotional campaign stating that we've received such an amazing response that we're adding one more audition in Karachi, open to participants from across Pakistan

FORMAT: 5 boys perform in  piano round
REMARKS:
Each act gets approximately 10 minutes, which includes pre-chat, performance and post-chat. Songs must be limited to 3–4 minutes.

Each week, one Golden Mic will be given — those contestants will earn a direct spot in the Top 16. 

Some contestants will be eliminated, while others will be given another opportunity during the final week of the Piano Round.
